job_tasks.phrase: plan, implement and deliver properly engineered high quality IT services and products
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities related to building and delivering services.

job_tasks.phrase: building proof-of-concept solutions with server system technology
job_tasks.justification: Building proof-of-concept solutions is a direct software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: architecting server solutions to address client requirements
job_tasks.justification: Architecting solutions is a fundamental software engineering task.

soft_skills.phrase: meet the needs of the client.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on understanding and fulfilling client requirements, which falls under business understanding and strategic alignment.

soft_skills.phrase: advise and consult where they see possibility for improvement on delivery related to the project.
soft_skills.justification: The act of advising and consulting implies communication and collaboration to suggest improvements.

soft_skills.phrase: Accustomed to handle multiple projects and deliver on-time.
soft_skills.justification: Delivering projects on time requires pragmatic planning and execution.

soft_skills.phrase: Keep knowledge up to date with certification needed for the role at the specific client
soft_skills.justification: The requirement to keep knowledge up-to-date and obtain certifications directly reflects a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses entirely on traditional IT service delivery, software development, system architecture, and operational aspects. There are no mentions of AI, ML, LLMs, or related tasks, placing it squarely within Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering) and excluding Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization). Therefore, it aligns with the Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role (Linux Engineer) and the responsibilities (planning, implementing, delivering IT services, architecting server solutions). The technologies mentioned (Azure, Redhat) are standard IT infrastructure components. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
